head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FRAUENGLASS, TILLIE K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FRAUENGLASS, TILLIE K.

block.p: FRAUENGLASS-Tillie K. On September 1, 2000. Devoted and beloved wife of the late William. Loving mother of Richard. Dear grandmother of Neil Frauenglass and Andrew Betts. Thanks, mom. Graveside service at New Montefiore Cemetery, Pinelawn, NY. For further information contact ''The Riverside,'' 212-362-6600.
